title: Increases penalties for grand larceny involving the theft of a motor vehicle; repealer
summary: Increases the penalties for multiple violations involving the theft of a motor vehicle; second offense for auto theft to be a class D felony.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to grand larceny and unauthorized use of a vehicle and repealing subdivision 1 of section 165.05 of such law relating thereto
